div.em: Current conditions as of 29 Apr 11:55 am CDT

div.div: Mostly sunny, with a high near 65. Breezy, with a north northwest wind around 25 mph, with gusts as high as 40 mph.
Mostly clear, with a low around 41. Breezy, with a northwest wind 15 to 20 mph decreasing to 5 to 10 mph after midnight. Winds could gust as high as 30 mph.
Sunny, with a high near 76. West northwest wind 5 to 10 mph becoming south in the afternoon.
